How to patch La Noire Disk 2

I gotta ask, how do you know if the video or sound needs a fixing? Whats the bug/error (symptom)?

I played trough DVD 1 and are on my way on DVD 2. I havent had any problems whit video or sound. But it says here that their might be problems whit DVD 2 & DVD 3.

Whats the problem and what does the fix do?

@Yobo1987 

u can know if there is a problem by a program called abgx360

google it and download it and then follow this tutorial to setup :
http://www.ixtreme.net/360-backups/4710-abgx-tutorial.html

after that run the iso through it and in the result of splitvid section will give u error ,that when u need to patch it ,this site have tutorial :
http://tehparadox.com/forum/f76/la-noire-xbox360-patching-discussion-tutorial-video-ssv-dmi-ap2-5-stealth-2232550/

and have fun : )

@Yobo1987 

or to make it easier for u there is a tutorial here for fixing vedio here :

http://www.rivalsoul.com/vb/showthread.php?t=223187&page=8

there is a reply in the page in english ,very easy to follow
It works like a charm to fix disk 3 as well. Tested on both: 2 & 3.

thanks patch works for both .dvd files 2 and 3.................. now all i have to worry about is this damn spring update, roll on LT+2.0!!!!! when im get the update thing pop up on my screen thats the time to unplug the net cable and play offline till the hackers catch up, i dont like the idea of haveing to pay for my games again!
NOTE TO ALL IF YOU LIKE YOUR FREE GAMES DONT UPDATE TO THE NEW DASH AS IT WILL REFLASH YOUR DRIVE BACK TO STOCK AND LEAVE YOUR "BACKUP" GAMES USELESS, UPDATE WILL HIT FROM 19TH MAY TILL 30TH
